error.dau: User is deactivated by Admin. Please contact system administrator to activate your account.
error.deu: User is deleted in the system.
error.alk: User account is locked.Please contact system administrator to unlock your account.
error.invalid-credential: Invalid credentials. Please try again with valid credentials.
error.login-otp-not-generated: Unable to generate OTP for login
error.invalid-user: User does not exists in the system
error.internal-server-error-message: Please contact administrator for this error.
error.password-already-exists: Password cannot be same as last {prev-password-limit} password.
error.actincompl: User Activation Incomplete.Please contact system administrator to activate your account.
error.dei: User Deactivated due to inactivity.Please contact system administrator to activate your account.
